means: 十三至十九数字（或号码）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: plural of teen, independent usage of -teen

entry.tran: 十几岁，青少年时期(指从 13 岁到 19 岁)
entry.def: If you are in your teens, you are between thirteen and nineteen years old.

example.ex: Most people who smoke began smoking in their teens...
example.tran: 多数烟民从十几岁时就开始抽烟了。

example.ex: My late teens and early twenties were really rough years...
example.tran: 我二十岁前后那几年过得真苦啊。

entry.tran: 面向青少年的;由青少年完成的
entry.def: Teen is used to describe things such as films, magazines, bands, or activities that are aimed at or are done by people who are in their teens.

example.tran: 乔治·卡林主演的青春片

example.ex: Pop isn't pop without huge teen sensations.
example.tran: 不能激起广大青少年热情的流行音乐就不能称其为流行音乐。

entry.tran: 青少年,十几岁的孩子(指从 13 岁到 19 岁)
entry.def: A teen is someone aged between thirteen and nineteen years old.

example.ex: It used to be that any teen who wanted a summer job could get one.
example.tran: 从前，十几岁的孩子到了暑假都能找着活干。

means.word_mean: 1. the time of life between the ages of 12 and 20
2. all the numbers that end in -teen
